DOC.brief_summary: This is a non-interventional study evaluating quality of life in schizophrenic patients treated with atypical antipsychotics, in the ambulatory setting. This is a 9-month, observational, multicentric prospective study.
DOC.brief_title: Quality of Life in Schizophrenic Patients
DOC.criteria: Patients diagnosed with Schizophrenia treated with atypical antipsychotics (ambulatory patients).
